text: The National People's Congress Foreign Affairs Committee () is one of nine special committees of the National People's Congress, the national legislature of the People's Republic of China. The special committee was created during the first session of the 6th National People's Congress in June 1983, and has existed for every National People's Congress since. ==Chairpersons== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Congress !! Chairperson |- | 6th National People's Congress || Geng Biao (耿飚) |- | 7th National People's Congress || Liao Hansheng (廖汉生) |- | 8th National People's Congress || Zhu Liang (朱良) |- | 9th National People's Congress || Zeng Jianhui (曾建徽) |- | 10th National People's Congress || Jiang Enzhu (姜恩柱) |- | 11th National People's Congress || Li Zhaoxing (李肇星) |- | 12th National People's Congress || Fu Ying (傅莹) |- | 13th National People's Congress || Zhang Yesui (张业遂) |} ==References== Category:Special committees of the National People's Congress Category:Parliamentary committees on Foreign Affairs
title: National People's Congress Foreign Affairs Committee
